meanings.sent1: The dog would chevy after the squirrel in the park.
meanings.sent2: The police officer had to chevy after the thief to catch him.
meanings.sent3: I tried to chevy after my little brother, but he was too fast for me!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts would chevy around in her mind, never settling on one idea.
meanings.sent5: The wind seemed to chevy with the leaves, swirling them in all directions.

meanings.definition: A brand of vehicle manufactured by Chevrolet
meanings.sent1: My neighbor just bought a new chevy and it looks really sleek.
meanings.sent2: The chevy parked in front of the house caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt of driving a chevy through a rainbow-filled road last night!
meanings.sent4: The chevy stood out among the other cars like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The chevy purred like a contented cat as it cruised down the highway.
